com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs

Class CifsConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs.CifsConnectionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverthereConnectionBuilder

    public class CifsConnectionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements OverthereConnectionBuilder
    Builds CIFS connections.

      Default port (23) used when the CIFS connection type is {#link TELNET.

      Default value (/wsman) for the connection option used to specify the context (URI) used by WinRM.

      Default value (false) for the connection option used to specify whether to use HTTPS for WinRM.
      static int DEFAULT_WINRM_ENVELOP_SIZE
      Default value (153600) for the connection option used to specify the WinRM envelop size in bytes to use.
      static int DEFAULT_WINRM_HTTP_PORT
      Default port (5985) used when the WINRM_ENABLE_HTTPS is set to false.
      static WinrmHttpsCertificateTrustStrategy DEFAULT_WINRM_HTTPS_CERTIFICATE_TRUST_STRATEGY
      Default value (WinrmHttpsCertificateTrustStrategy.STRICT) of the connection option used to specify the WinrmHttpsCertificateTrustStrategy for WinRM HTTPS connections.

      • PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS

        public static final java.lang.String PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS
        Connection option (Map<String, String>) that specifies the path to share mappings to use for CIFS, specified as a Map<String, String>, e.g. "C:\IBM\WebSphere" -> "WebSphere". If a path is not explicitly mapped to a share the administrative share will be used..
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public OverthereConnection connect()
        Description copied from interface: OverthereConnectionBuilder
        Creates the connection that corresponds to the arguments that were passed in the two-arg constructor of this class. The first argument is a String that specifies the type (and is identical to the name field of the Protocol annotation). The second argument is the ConnectionOptions.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface OverthereConnectionBuilder
        Returns:
        the created connection.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
